name: EDGE
overview: EDGE is the second of three Two Tribes classics to arrive on Wii U eShop. Other games in this range include 2D puzzle platformer Toki Tori and 3D puzzler RUSH. In EDGE, the award winning retro inspired platformer, players take direct control of the cube and roll their way around the game's dozens of levels. Search for all the prisms, find the shortcuts to improve your times. Off-TV gameplay supported. Retro styled platformer. Classic 8-bit inspired soundtrack. Over 100 levels (original, bonus and extended levels.) 1080p/60 frames per second display.
